Performance.comm: Router works well with good wireless signal.

cont.entity_a: Good signal strength within 75 feet but decreases with distance and walls. Wireless connection and speed are generally good, but firmware version 4 is problematic. Wireless reception is poor beyond 15-20 feet.
cont.entity_b: Wireless connectivity is unreliable, often disconnecting. Wireless interference affects performance.

cont.entity_a: Firmware updates are necessary for full functionality. Firmware upgrades can resolve some connectivity issues. Firmware updates can improve connectivity and security.
cont.entity_b: Firmware updates are lacking for modern OS compatibility.

cont.entity_a: Easy installation with automatic configuration software. Installation is simple, but firmware can be buggy. Easy to install with good performance, but lacks static DHCP support.
cont.entity_b: Installation wizard on CD is ineffective, especially with Windows Vista. Product is difficult to install, but works well once configured.

cont.entity_a: Setup is easy, with good support, and accommodates multiple PCs. Combines wireless and a 4-port switch with easy setup and firewall protection. Easy to set up, but may require resets for multiple PC use. Setup and configuration are easy with clear instructions.
cont.entity_b: Setup is complex, with outdated software and documentation.

cont.entity_a: Limited support for Windows NT and 2000. Incompatibility with Windows 2000, causing frequent 'Network Cable Unplugged' messages. Linksys offers limited support for Macs. Router is not compatible with some wireless cards. Router is obsolete and no longer supported by Cisco.
cont.entity_b: Vista support is poor, requiring workaround solutions. Product is not compatible with Windows Vista. Product is not supported for Windows 7 or newer OS. Product works well with Windows XP, but not with Vista.
Technical support is unhelpful, especially for Vista compatibility.

cont.entity_a: The advertised range of 300ft is questionable, with poor signal quality at 80 feet. The router has a good signal inside and adequate signal outside the house. Wireless range is limited, but the router is reliable for small areas.

The system worked well initially but requires frequent reboots by disconnecting from the power source. Three routers purchased were defective, shutting down unexpectedly. The router frequently needs resetting due to connectivity issues.
Basic configuration options may not suit users with advanced networking needs.
The router provides excellent security with firmware updates.
cont.entity_b: Wireless security settings can cause connectivity issues.

cont.entity_a: Router supports one IPSec pass-through session. The router's wireless option is unreliable. Router works well with a wired connection.
cont.entity_b: Music Bridge connects well when setup correctly. Music Bridge works well with wired connections. Music Bridge is effective for streaming audio over a network.

cont.entity_a: The user guide is incomplete and not suitable for non-network engineers.

cont.entity_b: Installation is challenging, with poor technical support.
Audio quality is good, but setup is cumbersome.
